ComicInfo.Summary:
Vengeance for the Dead: the war beyond time is over, the threat defeated. But what of the fate of Japan?! It's all out war in the ruins of the great city.
Held captive by Counselr Seko's Healer forces, Kazuyo finds herself freed when Japan crashes back to Earth. Believing her son and husband dead, Kazuyo seeks revenge! Kazuyo recovers her severed ring-hand from the wreckage and summons her armor, slaying Seko after defeating his bodyguard, Icespike. With the fighting over, Kazuyo is relieved to learn that her son still lives.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/rai-8-vengeance-for-the-dead/4000-36212/
ComicInfo.Title: Vengeance for the Dead
